title: Stop In The Name Of Trend 12/16: Arsenal, NBA Stuff, Giannis, Blizzard 2020, Jackass 4, Real Masks
itunes:title: Stop In The Name Of Trend 12/16: Arsenal, NBA Stuff, Giannis, Blizzard 2020, Jackass 4, Real Masks
description:
On this edition of Stop In The Name Of Trend Jack and Miles discuss Arsenal's recent performance slump, many NBA updates related to recent trades, Giannis Antetokounmpo reups his contract, the biggest snowstorm in 2 years is headed for the northeast, Jackass 4 is in production and Johnny Knoxville and Steve O are already in the hospital, and way too real face masks are going into production in Japan.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
